sentences.en: Christians were arrested for trying to convert people, to proselytise them.
sentences.cn: 基督徒因为试图改变他人的信仰而被捕。

sentences.en: Christians were arrested for trying to proselytize people.
sentences.cn: 基督徒因试图劝说人们入教而被逮捕.

sentences.en: I assured him we did not come here to proselytize.
sentences.cn: 我向他保证我们不是来这劝说入教.

sentences.en: I assured him we didn't come here to proselytize.
sentences.cn: 我向他保证我们并不是来改变他的信仰的。

words.tran_cn: 改变信仰；改信宗教；劝诱

trans.tran_en: If you proselytize, you try to persuade someone to share your beliefs, especially religious or political beliefs

trans.tran_cn: （使）改变宗教信仰[政治信仰、意见等]，使变节
